text.section:
A person who seeks to own a regulated firearm and purchases the regulated firearm from an out-of-state federally licensed gun importer, manufacturer, or dealer shall:
have the federally licensed importer, manufacturer, or dealer ship the regulated firearm to a licensee for processing; and
comply with §§ 5-103, 5-104, 5-117 through 5-129, and 5-136 of this subtitle.

If a person purchases a regulated firearm for use within the scope of the person's official duties, the Secretary may waive the 7-day waiting period under § 5-124 of this subtitle for:
law enforcement personnel of any unit of the federal government;
members of the armed forces of the United States or the National Guard; or
law enforcement personnel of the State or any local agency in the State.
